title: Can I please stop losing ARAMs Riot?
body: Got all the way back up to 50 wins over my losses now I always get outcomped with bad teammates which has lead me all the way back down to only 36 wins over my losses. All I do is lose and get like 1 win, never a consecutive win. I know your formula tries to keep it to 50:50 ratio but this is kinda bs and not fun especially since it only happened IMMEDIATELY AFTER I got to my 50 wins over losses. This game is dying for a reason and this doesn't help or add to the "random" factor that ARAM prides itself off of.

replies.body: I'll even take a close game at this point
